title: Suggestions for typefaces to use for writing a book about Dave Matthews Band
content:
Hi,

Does anyone have any suggestions for typefaces to use as body text and or headlines for a book on the Dave Matthews Band?  
Here is there website if it's helpful:

[http://davematthewsband.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417111513/http:/davematthewsband.com/ "http://davematthewsband.com")

Thanks!
author: bfingeroth
